name: Composition of steering group and observers
Results tables
description: Results tables from the study uploaded to the catalogue. Upload in a standard form is envisioned, to facilitate visualisation.

name: Study report
description: A link to the study report, if publicly available online

name: Study, other information
description: Any other file required for the study (up to 5 files up to 20MB each) and/or URLs to other relevant resources describing the study
